pr_title: Change color of Run button for native queries

timeline.message:
Change color of Run button for native queries

When a user tries to run a native query, change the color of the button to
Druid's secondary color to indicate that the user is not running a SQL query.

Before this change, the web-console would indicate this by changing the text
of the button from Run (SQL queries) to Rune (native queries). Rune could be
confusing to users as this appears to be a typo.

timeline.author: suneet-s

timeline.bodyText:
This should be nested within .run-button { to avoid collisions with other rune-buttons in the app.
In general the content of every scss file is nested within a selector of the same name.
timeline.author: vogievetsky

timeline.bodyText: Doing className={runeMode ? 'rune-button' : undefined} here would be more idiomatic.
timeline.author: vogievetsky
